root.name: Maestia
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7CPU: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4RAM: 1024 MB (1GB) FreeHDD: 3 GB FreeGraphics Card: IntelR 3100+ [Equivalent to Nvidia GeForce 6200]RecommendedOS: Windows XP / Vista /Windows 7CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 DuoRAM: 2048 MB (2GB) FreeHDD: 3 GB FreeGraphics Card: Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT or Ati Radeon 9800
